text.autoconfig.HDC.title: HideDiscordChat Config
text.autoconfig.HDC.option.settings.enab: If set to true, messages from Discord will not be shown
text.autoconfig.HDC.option.settings.filt: Comma separated string of rank names to filter, e.g. Mod,Staff Manager,Developer. Type * to filter all rank names.
text.autoconfig.HDC.option.settings.excl: Set to true to make filtered ranks an exclusive list, e.g.: Mod,Staff Manager,Developer will only show messages from those ranks.
